paper_abstract: Purpose - The purpose of this paper is to obtain an axiomatic characterization of Lowen's fuzzy compactness. Design/methodology/approach - The paper shows a characterization of Lowen's fuzzy compactness. Findings - The paper shows new results on fuzzy compactness. Research limitations/implications - Clearly, this paper is devoted to fuzzy topological spaces. Practical implications - The main applications are in the mathematical field. Originality/value - The paper presents original results on fuzzy topology.
